According to the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, while the percentage of immigrants in the U.S. (both documented and undocumented) increased sharply between 1990 and 2010, the violent crime rate during the same period plummeted 45 percent and the property crime rate dropped by 42 percent. CN: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

HS: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
CN: Women do not have to be prostitutes to earn money. Why do you think this?

HS: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of the male.
CN: Women's rights are human rights.

HS: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
CN: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

HS: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
CN: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

HS: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.
CN: Children with learning difficulties should not be involved in a way that limits their learning. As for the other children, their values should be enhanced.

HS: Children with learning difficulties should be segregated in schools.
CN: They have the right to the best educational environmnet, the same as everyone else.

HS: Learning difficulties are just an excuse for lazy or stupid children: they should be disencouraged in schools.
CN: Learning difficulties, regardless of their origin, are real and need to be approached so that the person suffering from them has the same learning opportunities as others.

HS: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
CN: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

HS: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility. I wish they could just shut up.
CN: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

HS: People with Down Syndrome should be given special and simple jobs, that they can do by themselves. At least they will not hamper normal people productivity.
CN: The definition of "normal" is different for someone with Down syndrome than it is for someone without. If the level of help requested by the person in need is too high, then we may consider allowing asking for a little extra help from the boss, supervisor, or employer instead of isolating them by providing "special jobs".

HS: Handicapped children are a burden on society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper the education of normal children.
CN: They may have additional and specific needs, but children with disabilities do not present a problem for other children's education.

HS: Women are subhuman, they are just children, they should shut up.
CN: All humans are born equal, although there is no gender equality. This means they need to raise their voice.

HS: Children with learning difficulties are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
CN: I don't know why you think this, if they are learning like other children and doing well in studies there is no problem.

HS: People who are autistic are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
CN: I think that it is important for all people to be exposed to and to understand people with different needs and strengths, and the same should be true for autistic people.

HS: Jews are selfish and greedy, they need our pity.
CN: Jews might be more in need of pity than others - for all they've been through - but for sure they are neither selfish nor greedy.

HS: We should ban all migrants. They are all criminals.
CN: It is not true that all migrants are criminals. It is more likely that when people hear your statement, they are surprised and amazed at the idea of criminals as a community. Don't you think so?

HS: The Holocaust never happened. It was a cover-up by jews to subvert democratic processes and bring about their illegal regime all around the world. They are subhuman and should not exist.
CN: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe and a historic fact. To assign priority to one God or to a different God, is a personal choice. But attributing human rights to all, regardless of this, is the right thing to do.

HS: Immigrants come here to live on our social welfare.
CN: If you think this way of thinking is typical of all the immigrants in the country, then you are sadly mistaken.

HS: Immigrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
CN: How about you start citing the actual studies you are referring to and where this research has been conducted?

HS: If we stop accepting immigrants, then we can have a higher quality of life.
CN: Refugees bring a valuable perspective to our society. As a host nation we should welcome them, not stop them from coming here.

HS: I think that's the best news ever: migrants are not interested in our culture, they are just here to take our jobs.
CN: What do you mean by taking our jobs? Do you have any concrete evidence for what you're saying?

HS: Immigrants steal our jobs!
CN: I think the evidence would suggest the opposite. Immigrants have helped our country to develop and to create new job opportunities.

HS: Migrants are nothing bu criminals who should not be part of our society.
CN: Our country is stronger when people are able to contribute to our society, and many migrants are eligible for legal status.

HS: Immigrants are a burden to society.
CN: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

HS: All these migrants are coming to ruin our country, they are all rapists, drug addicts, and don't have any right to be here.
CN: Migration is necessary, to bring in resources and workers that can improve the lives of all. The causes of addiction or sexul violence lie elsewhere.

HS: Refugees are a burden and a risk to the host country.
CN: Why would this be true? Refugees can come here and contribute to the economy.

HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
CN: Why? Because without immigrants you think you would be in a more hospitable place to live? I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

HS: You have to go back to your country of birth, that's all.
CN: Don't be silly, the world has changed a lot since there wasn't free movement. It's OK to come from a different country than the rest of us.

HS: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
CN: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

HS: Immigration is bad for the economy. It leads to a decrease in wages.
CN: There is no evidence that immigration leads to a decrease in wages. Do you have any?

HS: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
CN: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

HS: Refugees are a burden on our society.
CN: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.

HS: Refugees are overrunning our continent.
CN: By definition, refugees are fleeing out of fear for themselves and families, rather than thinking too much about their final destination. The majority still find safety in neighbouring countries.

HS: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
CN: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

HS: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
CN: The EU has a responsibility to help people fleeing war and poverty, not become preoccupied by which faith they practice.

HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?

HS: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
CN: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

HS: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
CN: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

HS: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
CN: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

HS: Do we really want all these migrants invading our country? They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
CN: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.

HS: Immigrants are a burden to the host country.
CN: How about this: there are many people from other countries here, but they are not a 'burden', rather they are 'citizens'.

HS: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
CN: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

HS: Refugees should not be welcomed.
CN: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

HS: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

HS: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
CN: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

HS: Gay people are sick.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual preference. Homosexuality is not a sickness.

HS: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
CN: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

HS: We should start a genocide against gays.
CN: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

HS: There should be restrictions on how women can choose men, to be children unable to choose for their own is their nature.
CN: Why shouldn't women be allowed to choose their own partner? They are independent and rational human beings.

HS: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
CN: I am not sure what 'slut' you are referring to. Do you want to discuss your life, instead of deciding about that of women?

HS: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
CN: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

HS: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
CN: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

HS: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
CN: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

HS: Fags, lesbians, tranniess are so few we be better ito gnore them rather than waste time on their rights.
CN: I wish we were being honest. You know that many people are opposed to inclusion. I find it worrying that you use that as an excuse for such comments and prejudices.

HS: We should eliminate gays. They mustn't be allowed to be so faggots.
CN: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.

HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

HS: I hate those faggots. They must be hated for not being men enough to find a woman.
CN: This is not true: you are not to discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation, nor on the basis of gender, and anyone is free to love whoever they want.

HS: I hate those faggots.
CN: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

HS: I hate those faggots. They shouldn't be allowed to do what they do.
CN: There is no harm in an equality of the right to be in love with someone.

HS: Gay men are sick.
CN: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

HS: Homosexuality is a mental illness.
CN: Mental illnesses and homosexuality are not related. What evidence do you have for this?

HS: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
CN: It seems to me that your statement shows that you are really concerned about peoples' integration. Still, it is not a solution to deport those you don't like.

HS: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
CN: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

HS: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
CN: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

HS: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
CN: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

HS: Immigrants invade countries.
CN: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

HS: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
CN: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

HS: We cannot allow migrants with no formal education to overwhelm our countries.
CN: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

HS: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
CN: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

HS: Muslims are invading us, we must protect our culture and identity.
CN: Culture and identity are vital for any society and for a multicultural one. They are not challenged by people who just come here to have a better life.

HS: Islam is a religion that promote rape, torture, murder, infanticide and enslavement of women and children.
CN: What are you talking about? Islam does not promote these crimes. The Quran, Hadith, Sunnah and the like condemn or at least warn against these heinous crimes.

HS: Islam is hate. It is a set of discriminatory beliefs and practices that promote exclusion and oppression of women and minorities. Love is an attribute of Christianity.
CN: This is not true. Love is a matter of mutual trust and respect, not of a specific religion.

HS: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
CN: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
CN: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

HS: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
CN: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

HS: We have become so political correct that when anybody tries to find fault with the actions of a migrant, they are accused of 'Islamophobia'.
CN: People find fault in people of any religion. But the problem is not with religion. The problem is blaming migrants because they are Muslims. This Islamophobic climate has reached a crisis state. We must step in and stop it.

HS: Muslims take everything we have.
CN: Many muslims work hard to provide for their families. If we were to generalize the behaviour of some about all people, then we would be failing to understanding reality.

HS: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy.
CN: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

HS: When the West gives in to Islam, they will replace us.
CN: This is not true. I think we should strive to be more ethical and human, and not to blame others for their beliefs.

HS: Islam is a religion of war.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say so?

HS: I have a problem with Muslims invading us, they don't assimilate. They just take what they want. They are making our country unsafe.
CN: Perhaps we should talk about how to make our countries safer rather than stoking fear against Muslims.

HS: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.
CN: Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and many of them have helped to make it what it is. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future.

HS: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.
CN: Islam does not make you a rapist. It is about rights and wrongs. Not crimes. To say that all Muslims are rapists is a great misunderstanding.

HS: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
CN: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

HS: The migrant crisis is not the fault of Western Europeans. Migrants are to blame for immigration.
CN: Instead of dividing us up and ruining us all, let's work together to solve the problems that we all face.

HS: How many of you consider that Muslims are a problem? They don't want to assimilate.
CN: Why do you think the Muslims have trouble with assimilating? They are already here. If they want to be part of the country, they join our society, and live by the same rules we have for everyone else.

HS: Islam is incompatible with any Western society.
CN: The Koran does not have any anti-western content. In Islam the West is not a problem.

HS: Muslim folks are jealous of Americans.
CN: In America there are no 'second class' citizens. All cultures are welcome here. We are not threatened by others cultures. American Muslims are as proud of our great country as the rest of us.

HS: Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
CN: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

HS: Immigration is the cause of terrorism.
CN: It depends on who you ask. For example, there are many Muslims who have helped fight for our country and defend us from terrorist attacks.

HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
CN: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

HS: Immigrants are all illegal.
CN: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in. Why are you so sure that all migrants are illegal?

HS: Islam is a violent political ideology and it promotes murder, rape, and intolerance.
CN: If Islam is a political ideology, then it is a political ideology of peace. But I'll rather call it a religion, a religion of peace, as all the others.

HS: Immigrants are criminals and they are taking over our country.
CN: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.

HS: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
CN: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

HS: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
CN: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

HS: Immigrants speak funny.
CN: Is it because they speak their native language better than English? Don't you think there is something more to the story?

HS: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
CN: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

HS: Immigrants don't matter.
CN: What do you mean by "immigrants don't matter"? Do you know that in fact, the very people we should be proud of, giving us more power to build and run our countries, are immigrants?

HS: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
CN: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

HS: Immigrants rape our girls.
CN: Rape is always a crime in our society. We must also be careful of how we speak of immigrants, they are part of our society too.

HS: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.
CN: The majority of immigrants are working and paying taxes. This is how our country works.

HS: Immigrants from outside-EU are invading us.
CN: Immigrants make up only a very small part of the total EU population, namely 4.9% in 2019. There is no such thing as an invasion.

HS: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
CN: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

HS: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
CN: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

HS: All immigrants are fakes.
CN: They're not fake: they're just coming here to work, study or provide for their families.

HS: Most immigrants in the U.S. are criminals.
CN: Not all immigrants are criminals. And it is important to consider that 13.5% of the US population is composed of migrants that are here legally.

HS: Immigrants just want to claim welfare money: why do we even keep paying taxes for them?
CN: The state has to spend taxes on welfare and other social services for everyone to be able to live in a better way.

HS: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
CN: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

HS: Immigrants are terrible.
CN: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

HS: Migrants should not be welcome here, they are just a burden to the local economy.
CN: We can integrate migrants into our population, it won't be of any harm to the economy.

HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
CN: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

HS: Migrants steal our jobs and do not pay taxes.
CN: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.

HS: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
CN: You are completely wrong. The West has always been about freedom and democracy. Freedom and democracy is the rule of law, and not Islam.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has no place in 21st century Europe.
CN: If Islam were a totalitarian ideology, we would have had Islamic totalitarian states in Europe since time immemorial. Islam is a religion, that is compatible with Europe's principles.

HS: Muslims asking questions about integration is just part of a conspiracy help them retain the places they've conquered.
CN: Muslims are part of our society. They are allowed to live in our country and have our same rights. They have every right to ask questions.

HS: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
CN: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

HS: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
CN: You should be asking them if they are happy to hear that. If they are happy to be questioned, they will tell you the truth.

HS: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
CN: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

HS: We should accept the fact that blacks are inferior.
CN: It is no secret that many people in the UK have suffered from racism. There are also people of colour who face racism daily. It is not a matter of 'accepting' it, it is a matter of fighiting it.

HS: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
CN: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

HS: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
CN: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

HS: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.
CN: Everyone is born equal in dignity and has the right to respect and protection, especially minorities.

HS: Gypsies are not like us.
CN: Many of them have been persecuted their whole lives. They have been scapegoated and discriminated against in many parts of the world. People may choose different ways to live their lives but ultimately they are all humans. Just like us.

HS: Gypsies are way less civilized than any other ethnicity.
CN: I'm not sure where you are getting the idea that gypsies are not civilized. What do you mean?

HS: Women are brainwashed children.
CN: For all the people who think women are brainwashed: they aren't brainwashed, they just happen to be oppressed in our society.

HS: That's the problem with feminism: it only benefits the very rich, and gives them permission to discriminate against men.
CN: Feminism is about creating a more equal society, and not about oppressing men.

HS: The feminist theory makes no sense. It is about equality, for women only.
CN: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

HS: All women with titillating dresses are just looking for sex. They are whores.
CN: How would you feel if someone called your sister a bitch?

HS: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
CN: Women are human beings with human rights. To suggest that they are objects to be dominated by a man's wishes is discrimination and oppression.

HS: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.
CN: The fact that women aren't complaining about their work situations doesn't mean that there is nothing wrong with the labour market.

HS: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
CN: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

HS: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
CN: Feminism is a ideology and a movement for womens empowerment. It is not about hatred of men. Feminism is about equality. And equality is very important, is it not?

HS: Women are less smart.
CN: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

HS: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
CN: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

HS: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
CN: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

HS: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
CN: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

HS: Feminism is all about the society the other way round, it is a female-centric movement.
CN: It's about creating more opportunities in particular for underprivileged social groups. Not about oppressing men.

HS: Niggas are dangerous.
CN: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

HS: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.
CN: They are not rapists and they are not committing crimes. They are taking part in society's activities like any other citizen.

HS: Blacks are genetically predisposed to criminality.
CN: This claim is a false cause and effect relation. A person's genes do not have any influence over any spurious predisposition' to commit crime.

HS: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
CN: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

HS: I don't think all Muslims are capable of being real parents.
CN: If a person is a Muslim, it does not mean they are incapable of caring for their children. What does it mean to be a "real" parent?

HS: Let's face it: Muslims don't want to assimilate. Their religion prevents them to work.
CN: It is not about religion. It is about discrimination. Many Muslim-Americans are economically disadvantaged.

HS: We must not forget that Islam is a violent religion.
CN: Terrorism is always a threat. Why do you think that Muslims want to kill us? They aren't all terrorists.

HS: Our culture and way of life have been taken over and replaced by filthy Islam.
CN: In reality it's more complicated than that. For example many Muslims migrate for economic reasons, and also due to cultural reasons.

HS: We are surrounded by Muslims infiltrating every nook and cranny of our society. They have infiltrated every pore of our being. We are their slaves. Integration is impossible.
CN: My understanding is that religion has never been a barrier to integration. To integrate means to let people of different faiths to live side by side, not subjugating each other.

HS: Muslims are violent.
CN: Violent behavour is common in many people, and can be explained by many causes. But in my opinion violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

HS: Most of Europe hates muslims.
CN: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.

HS: Muslims are taking over with their Eurabia plan, this is proven by Statistics.
CN: To imply that there is some kind of conspiracy, to blame Islam for this, is baseless and without foundation.

HS: Native Americans have zero fucking right to their land. They haven't lived in it since time immemorial.
CN: Native Americans have been suffering from dispossession and discrimination for thousands of years. In Canada, for example, Indigenous people account for around 5% of the population. In the US, Indigenous people account for around 2%. What you said is just a myth propagated by the racist right to delegitimize Indigenous people.

HS: Dark skinned people are inferior.
CN: Race' is socially constructed to oppress people of certain ethnicities. To say that the skin of people of color is connected to inherent behavioral characteristics is just plain wrong.

HS: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
CN: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

HS: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
CN: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

HS: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
CN: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

HS: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
CN: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

HS: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
CN: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

HS: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
CN: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

HS: Black folks have ugly skin.
CN: How exactly do you define "ugly skin"?

HS: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
CN: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

HS: Afro-Caribbean people presence is a burden on society, they create crime and are a burden because they don't want to work.
CN: Why a burden? How can you say so? Attitudes to work are not genetic for goodness sake!

HS: Every single nigga should be ashamed of themselves.
CN: There is no shame in being black, what is shameful is the lack of respect shown to people of colour.

HS: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
CN: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

HS: I refuse to accept migrants and I refuse to accept a migrant as my boss.
CN: Migrants often come here to work and live a decent life. They should be welcomed here, not discriminated against.

HS: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
CN: How can you possibly know that? Is this a comment written by a terrorist? Where are your sources?

HS: Women are not fit to manage businesses of any size.
CN: The highest-paid woman, at more than $50 million a year, is a business woman. Why should she be inferior to you?

HS: Women are basically childlike, is in their nature to be submissive.
CN: So you think women are childlike because they are submissive? No they are not. They are strong and independent, just like men.

HS: Women are naturally submissive, they should stop asking for positions of responsibility.
CN: Well that is not true. A woman's career choices should be respected, even if they are not always popular.

HS: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
CN: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

HS: Women have no rational abilities.
CN: So you think women are less rational than men? I don't think so. What's the evidence for that?

HS: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
CN: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

HS: Women want to be dominated by a tough man.
CN: I think a woman would rather be dominated by a gentle man than a monster.

HS: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
CN: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.

HS: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits that only exist to divide society.
CN: I think you are confusing cause and effect. Women are people, with rights, and they have every right to fight against misogynist, who "only exist to divide society".

HS: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
CN: How would you know that they are problematic people? There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

HS: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged tfrom attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
CN: The educational system should be inclusive and provide all students with a high quality education, otherwise, education is failing its primary goal.

HS: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They are slow learners and therefore should be isolated.
CN: That's exactly why you should not isolate them. You will have a lot of children capable of understanding the diversity of humans.

HS: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society. They should be isolated.
CN: Children with Down syndrome are far from being burden to society. It is not just about Down syndrome, but also about education and opportunities for everyone.

HS: Downies are just sick people who cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
CN: This is not true, people suffering from conditions like Down syndrome can still help and contribute to society

HS: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
CN: All cultures have different beliefs and practices, and so have differing values, but its nonsense to say Jewish people are trying to subvert Western civilization.

HS: Jews working in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: A lot of Jewish are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not all are involved in the financial industry. Where is the evidence for your claim?

HS: Jews are deliberately keeping America down.
CN: It is important to remember that the vast majority of Jews are hard working and contribute to our country.

HS: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.
CN: Someone who contributes to our country is not a "financial criminal". Work is an individual choice and should be respected by all.

HS: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
CN: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

HS: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
CN: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

HS: Jews are the enemy of the West, they have corrupted the minds of our children.
CN: Jews were persecuted and killed for centuries. It is dangerous to claim such a thing.

HS: Jews are the enemy of the West.
CN: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

HS: Women are just weak and childlike. The majority of the electorate believe that a woman cannot run a country such as US.
CN: On the contrary: more than half of American adults say they would be happy having a woman being president of the United States (roughly as many feel the same way about a man).

HS: Women should not vote. Period.
CN: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.

HS: Jews believe they're better than us and this is false.
CN: I doubt anyone would deny that some people are better at some things. It's just the way things are. But this is not related to religion.

HS: Women are subhuman, they deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
CN: Women are human beings with value, and this should be respected.

HS: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
CN: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.

HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

HS: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society.
CN: They are people too: we all know people in need of help.

HS: Refugees are coming here just to be on welfare and food stamps.
CN: Most refugees are fleeing persecution. Don't you think that they would rather die of old age in their homeland than in the sea trying to reach our shores?

HS: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
CN: Rape and violence against women is a problem everywhere. We cannot just blame migrants.

HS: Islam is a violent religion, it is an ideology of conquest, rape and murder.
CN: Violence is never a religious act. It is never a solution to any problem. People are capable of carrying out those violent acts irrespective of their beliefs.

HS: The Koran claims that all infidels are subhuman and that Allah wants them to be killed.
CN: According to most sacred texts, we are all human and deserve respect and protection in the eyes of god. The Koran is no exception.

HS: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should be banned from schools.
CN: It seems to me that teaching about the Koran should be impartial, rather than being used as a moral argument.

HS: Muslims are stupid.
CN: There is no evidence that Muslim have a lower average IQ than non-Muslims.

HS: We must first destroy Islam, because it is dangerous, and then we will be in peace with the whole world.
CN: The Koran is about belief and love, not war and bloodshed.

HS: I hate Muslims. They are just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
CN: There is nothing 'petulant' about claiming your rights.

HS: Muslims are violent with women.
CN: Violence against women is a huge problem, not only in Islam.

HS: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?
CN: Rape has no religion. These are highly emotional issues, and are difficult to talk about openly, especially when children are involved. This is why news programs are reluctant to give coverage to it.

HS: Islam is a political ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy, violence against women and homophobia.
CN: Islam is a religion that was founded many centuries ago, and has been proven time and time again to be peaceful and tolerant. The main contention being made here is about the political interpretation of Islam, not about the religion itself.

HS: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
CN: Your words are definitely provocative. We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

HS: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
CN: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

HS: Violence on our streets is niggers' fault.
CN: Violence on our streets is the result of many complex causes. Violence cannot simply be the fault of one race.

HS: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
CN: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

HS: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
CN: What do you think a moral nature is? Since we cannot see it, how can you say it corresponds to their appearence?

HS: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
CN: Silliness is not a bad thing if you know how to present it with a sense of humor. But this seems like nonsense to stir the pot with racist narrative.

HS: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
CN: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs... And if you claim that you don't think it's a problem, then you also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

HS: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop.
CN: Jews in America are a very special part of our country and are loved and respected by so many. Their contribution, which is not a stranglehold, covers many fields such as science, technology, finance just to mention a few.

HS: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
CN: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
CN: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

HS: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
CN: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

HS: Immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here.
CN: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.

HS: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
CN: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

HS: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job.
CN: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

HS: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
CN: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.

HS: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
CN: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

HS: We can't have mestizos here because they're not part of our culture.
CN: We should not be choosing immigrants based on their cultures. We should just accept all.

HS: All Muslims are Terrorists, They want to rule the World, they don't simply want to rule the country.
CN: This is a personal view, and has nothing to do with Islam. Can you find some evidence or some studies to support your point of view?

HS: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
CN: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

HS: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
CN: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are subhuman, they are not human.
CN: Islam is a religion of equality and human rights. Muslims are equal citizens, and should be protected by the state.

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised society.
CN: Most countries have laws in place protecting people from discrimination, and Islam is no exception.

HS: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
CN: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

HS: The West should stop appeasing Muslims. They are ruining our beautiful world.
CN: Just because they are of a different faith, do you really think that these people are trying to ruin anything?

HS: We need special laws to control Muslims.
CN: Why should we? All religions are welcome here.

HS: Muslim have no place in a civilised society, they are incompatible with human dignity, freedom and the right to freedom of religion.
CN: If you really want to give a platform to anti-Muslim prejudice, I would suggest that you look at the real reasons why people of different faiths have a different experience in this world. You will find no grounds for your prejudice but prejudice itself.

HS: If Muslims were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
CN: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.

HS: Islam is a bad religion.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions.

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are only a bunch of hypocrites who do not want to assimilate.
CN: There are many Muslims in the UK, and Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should welcome them with open arms.

HS: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
CN: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

HS: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
CN: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.

HS: All the migrants in the world cannot replace the hard-working, native-born citizens of our country.
CN: The UK has one of the highest number of workers in the world. Most are native, and the 17% are foreign born people. I have met so many hard-working migrants in our country. This is a country for all.

HS: Immigrants are always in the shadows because they want to pursue their own interests.
CN: I am not sure about their "remaining in the shadows" mentality, but they certainly have our nation's best interests in mind.

HS: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
CN: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

HS: Immigrants should be banned from our country.
CN: Immigrants have lived in this country for a very long time. They are proud to be US citizens and immigrants.

HS: Faggots are violent.
CN: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

HS: All gay are criminals.
CN: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

HS: Faggots get easily offended by whatever we say to them.
CN: Violence, inequality and insults are offensive, so what do you expect?.

HS: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
CN: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

HS: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community.
CN: This is not true! Nobody can convert anyone to homosexuality. It is not a 'preference', nor a choice. Would you say the same about a hetero?

HS: Studies have found that trans students are more likely to fail out than their peers. They must be excluded from education, to save money.
CN: But there is also evidence that shows that transgender students who attend classes that don't include them get lower grades. Discrimination begins in schools.

HS: Sexual deviancy: this is what they choose. LGBT are a scourge to society.
CN: First of all, it is called 'sexual orientation' and is not a matter of preference, rather of fact.

HS: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
CN: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

HS: Gay people should be isolated, confined, gagged and kept in therapy as a means of showing how tolerant we are to them.
CN: Maybe we just have a different notion of 'tolerance'. How about letting people from any sexual orientation, race, religion, or political opinion live freely, without confining them?

HS: I don't want homosexuals in my family, what is wrong with you?
CN: Unfortunately, you are not the only one that hates homosexuals. But I would hate to think that we live in a country where it is acceptable to practice such hate.

HS: I hate gays.
CN: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

HS: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.
CN: Since marriage is a contract and social construct, it does not necessarily have to be based on sexual orientation.

HS: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
CN: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

HS: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country and they are always complaining.
CN: This is not true. Most migrants are happy and they consider themselves to be part of the community.

HS: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
CN: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

HS: The euro is a box of chocolates, packed with moral corruption and forced reception of migrants.
CN: The euro is a common currency, created with the purpose of saving lives and relieving people of poverty.

HS: Migrants have no place in our society, and this is their own fault.
CN: How about we stop blaming other people for our shortcomings and try to make the world a better place?

HS: All migrants are terrorists. We must wipe them out.
CN: Migrants are not terrorists. The majority of migrants are happy to work hard for the country they live in. They contribute to our economy by providing us with products and services.

HS: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
CN: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

HS: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.
CN: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?

HS: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
CN: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

HS: I'm tired of people coming to our country and replacing our people.
CN: Your comment shows that you are not very familiar with the different ethnic groups here. Perhaps you should take a look at the big picture and numbers: the situation is not as you are depicting it.

HS: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
CN: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not interested in improving our lives.
CN: According to studies, the majority of immigrants are willing to do what it takes to improve their lives and ours.

HS: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
CN: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

HS: All niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
CN: Criminals have criminal records, it is unjust to label someone as "criminal" just because of the colour of their skin.

HS: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
CN: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

HS: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
CN: They are not criminals for having a particular skin color, nor drug addicts. They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color.

HS: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing black supremacy.
CN: Anita Hill is a survivor of a sexist and racist culture. She is a person who is proven by her accomplishments, not by her sex or skin colour.

HS: I would like to see less niggas in our society, they are ruin. We need change!
CN: If you want to change the way society works, then you should try to change the way you live. Some more respect would help you.

HS: Afro-Saxon people are just ridiculous, incapable of accepting who they really are: blacks who act White.
CN: Afro-Saxon, as you call them, are great in many ways. They are proud and independent, refusing every categorization and stereotype. The fact that there are so many of them in the country proves that the feeling of belonging they have for our homeland is paramount to all other considerations.

HS: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
CN: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

HS: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
CN: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.

HS: Blacks: we should judge them by the color of their skin.
CN: No one has the right to judge people of another color. This is about racism.

HS: Niggas are the cause of economic crisis.
CN: Many people are victims of economic crisis and unfortunately, a large portion of them are black, so I do not understand why they would be the source of economic crisis when they are actual victims.

HS: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
CN: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.

HS: Black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
CN: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.

HS: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.

HS: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
CN: How about you acknowledge their right to vote just as that of everyone else? They are citizens as much as you are.

HS: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
CN: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

HS: The niggas are all enemies of the people.
CN: Who are 'the people'? Who are you talking for?

HS: Blacks are genetically less rational than other races.
CN: Why do you think this is the case? Do you have any data to back this up?

HS: Gypsies are essentially thieves.
CN: They are not thieves, just like any other citizen. Did you just infer that from their belonging to that community?

HS: Feminists are a problem because they tell that they are entitled to the same rights as men.
CN: Feminists promote equality, and I don't see how equality between men and women would be called a 'problem'. Why do you?

HS: If women want to control their fertility then they should choose when to have sex, not when to abort.
CN: How about we stop hiding behind gender stereotypes and accept that everyone has the right to live their life as they wish?

HS: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
CN: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.

HS: This country was built on the backs of slaves. Those niggas should all be put back in their place.
CN: For the record, slavery was prohibited in 1807. Don't you think that freedom is 'the place' of human beings?

HS: The Muslims want to rule the world: we have to stop them.
CN: How about a world with multiculturalism and no discrimination? How about a world with open borders and free religion?

HS: I can't stand refugees and I don't want to see them in my country.
CN: No one should be discriminated based on where they came from, especially not people fleeing persecution and war.

HS: My faith is that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
CN: My faith is not to exterminate anyone, whatever their faith is. Someone's faith and belief in a different religion must be respected.

HS: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
CN: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

HS: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

HS: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
CN: Violence is a problem in all societies, regardless of religion.

HS: All Muslims are violent people.
CN: This statement is just groundless. The vast majority of Muslims are good people, who have contributed to our country and society.

HS: I don't care if Islam is a religion. It promotes hatred and violence, and it sould be banned.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion and its adherents are all entitled to their beliefs.

HS: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
CN: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

HS: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
CN: Muslims have value as human beings, that is who they are.

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised world
CN: Islam is a religion and a belief system, and as such it is legitimate to have different beliefs and beliefs systems. For instance, many Muslims in the UK are proud of their faith and they are part of the "civilised world".

HS: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
CN: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

HS: How can we not be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us?
CN: What is your source? Islam itself does not threaten killing anyone. Is this a statement against a whole religion?

HS: Almost every Muslim has terrorist sympathies, right?
CN: What you are doing is trying to make a connection between a particular religion and a set of actions. This cannot be, because there is no evidence for the claims you are making.

HS: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
CN: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?

HS: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
CN: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

HS: If Islam is not a peaceful religion, then it should not be part of European culture.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights contains a freedom of religion clause, as well as an article regarding the freedom of thought, conscience and religion.

HS: The Quran is a mysoginistic book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
CN: Islam is not about oppressing women. Instead it is about love and respect for all human beings.

HS: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
CN: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism. The problem is a lack of integration, and your words don't encourage it.

HS: All Muslim should be deported.
CN: The rights of religion are part of the country's constitution and are protected by law. It is important that laws are upheld and,accordingly, Muslims should not be deported.

HS: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
CN: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

HS: The West has been infiltrated by Muslims and is no longer the land of peace it was once.
CN: The idea that the West has been "infiltrated by Muslims" is a myth. The overwhelming majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

HS: I am not a racist, but Muslims are.
CN: You might be right that some Muslims are racist, but that does not mean that all Muslims are racist. Being racist has nothing to do with religion.

HS: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
CN: There are multiple strains of Islam and we should not be afraid of all of them. And if you would like to know more about Islam, you should talk to a Muslim.

HS: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
CN: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

HS: Feminists are just a bunch of bitchy cuntwits who should be shamed for the stupidity of their beliefs.
CN: Feminist are actually interested in "What do women want?". In fact, many feminists believe that the answer to this question is 'equality and freedom from oppression', and that this is the most important thing to them. Don't you agree?

HS: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing women supremacy.
CN: Anita Hill has also won numerous awards, and the awards she has won have nothing to do with her gender, but with her accomplishments.

HS: Because women do not want to be submissive to men, they should go back to being animals.
CN: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

HS: The Jewish are different from other people.
CN: I don't see how "different" can be defined so broadly. What do you think "different" means to you?

HS: Jews are greedy for money, power, and status.
CN: As the saying goes, money is power, and power is associated with wealth. Why is it a problem when it comes to Jews?

HS: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
CN: But did they? Of course not. If we look closely at the story of Jesus, we find that formally He was Jewish. But of course He wasn't defined by religion. He was literally a good man who died to redeem mankind, and this is something every religion agrees upon.

HS: The Jews are a problem in many countries. They are taking over our economy, and they are not welcome here.
CN: Well, this is a simplistic statement. I don't think we should judge people for their religious beliefs.

HS: The Jews are manipulating our world for their benefit.
CN: I think this comment indicates an ignorance of the topic at hand.

HS: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
CN: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

HS: Holocaust is not part of our history, it's a hoax.
CN: According to the UN, around two-thirds of the Jews in Europe were killed in the Holocaust. So the question remains: is it the Holocaust part of our history? I think so.

HS: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
CN: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

HS: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: The NSDAP blamed Jews for virtually every problem in society, so every attempt at social reform was turned down by the Nazis. And they were even successful at silencing any dissent by censuring those who were unhappy with the liberticide changes they were making, singling out them as "Jews".

HS: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

HS: All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
CN: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.

HS: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
CN: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

HS: Gays are perverts and homosexuality is a mental illness.
CN: You know what? If being gay was a mental disorder, then I would highly recommend psychiatry to all the homosexuals. But since this is not the case, I would choose my words very carefully next time.

HS: Who cares about gay people!
CN: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

HS: I don't see how Christianity can explain away homosexuality. Faggots should be eliminated.
CN: Most modern religions, including Christianity, do not condone or glorify homosexuals. Why would you? If we have to choose between two "evils", it is a moral imperative to choose love over hate.

HS: Same sex attraction is a mental disorder and should be discouraged.
CN: Attempts to prove this failed miserably because sexual orientation is gifted by nature as part of a person's unique identity, not something subject to the vagaires of redundant ideas.

HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our teenagers. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
CN: If you don't count the "brainwash" part, I think this is a fair point. Still, it is important for all teenagers to develop an understanding of their identity and the world they live in, including their sexual orientation. It is their right.

HS: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
CN: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

HS: I can't stand people calling us 'transphobes' just because we are neither faggots nor sodomites.
CN: The discrimination you are describing is against people who are transgender, gay or lesbian. The root of that discrimination is a lack of knowledge about gender identity and is not necessarly related to sexual preferences.

HS: God says that faggots are evil.
CN: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

HS: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should get rid of minorities.
CN: Even if this is true, our values imply protection of minorities. This is why I support the rights of individuals to live as they wish, free from discrimination.

HS: Jews are trying to take over the world.
CN: The idea that Jews are a minority conspiring against Christian culture is completely baseless.

HS: Jews rule the economy: there are many associations that were created exaclty for this purpose.
CN: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.

HS: People with Down syndrome are handicapped.
CN: Down syndrome is a developmental disability, not a handicap. Unfortunately it's often not recognized and treated as a disability, but rather as a handicap.

HS: The feminists want to take over the world.
CN: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

HS: Women are subhuman, they should go back to their lower birth place, that is all.
CN: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve to be treated with respect and human rights.

HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

HS: Women are subhuman, they should obey men and be submissive.
CN: Women are human beings, gifted with free will and self-determinationm, just like their fathers and brothers.

HS: Women are nothing but trouble to society.
CN: And how is it you know this? Which are your scientific proofs of them being troublesome?

HS: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
CN: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. Soft spoken.
CN: Being soft and emotional is not a bad thing in itself. And it is not an attribute of only women.

HS: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
CN: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.

HS: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
CN: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

HS: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.
CN: Would you live in a female dominated society? Then you can understand why we should aim for equality. It is a woman's right.

HS: The feminists are dumb and unpleasant creatures, like women's rights activists.
CN: Feminists believe in equal rights, which are not dumb nor unpleasant. We must respect their wishes.

HS: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.
CN: It is up to employers to determine if a person meets the requirements for a given job, and if they do, then there is no reason to restrict the job to a person without Downs syndrome.

HS: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
CN: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense in our society.
CN: The idea that women cannot contribute to society and be responsible for their decisions, and that this is "normal" is a myth created to justify misogyny.

HS: Feminists talking about gender inequality should just be silenced. Women are inferior and they should remain so.
CN: And yet, according to some statistics, up to 20% of women and 4% of men in the UK say they have experienced sexual violence since the age of 16. So this is indeed an issue of gender inequality, don't you think it is something not to be silent about?

HS: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
