CN: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

HS: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
CN: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

HS: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
CN: And who would be 'normal'? I wonder how you would define 'disabled' people?

HS: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.
CN: That's wrong. There are non-profit organizations that have a long history of assisting Down persons in finding productive work.

HS: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
CN: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

HS: Immigrants take our jobs, they take our country.
CN: Immigrants do not take our jobs. They work as legal employees and their presence in the country nourishes the economy.

HS: Gay men being shot is funny.
CN: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

HS: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
CN: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

HS: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
CN: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society?

HS: LGBTs are a burden to society
CN: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

HS: Gay men are annoying.
CN: They're not all that annoying. Gay men are normal guys who find love and/or sex with someone of their own sex.

HS: We cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
CN: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.

HS: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
CN: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

HS: Gays are just hating animals.
CN: Just because you disagree with their sexuality doesn't mean you have a right to hate on them.

HS: Being gay is not about marriage, it is about anal sex without brakes and this is horrible.
CN: Homosexuality is also about love, not only about sex.

HS: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
CN: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

HS: Feminists want men to be oppressed just like animals.
CN: Feminism is about standing up for weaker people and trying to make the world a better place. Its not about standing on the side of the oppressors.

HS: Migrants are a problem in my opinion. They are bringing disease, they are ruining our country.
CN: Maybe you should get acquainted with migrants instead of making assumptions about people you do not know.

HS: immigrants don't belong here: they are the source of all our problems.
CN: You can't blame immigrants for all the problems we have in this world.

HS: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
CN: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

HS: Foreigners are literally flooding into our country. Their every action must be monitored and recorded by the police.
CN: We are fortunate to live in a country where the vast majority of people have open hearts and minds. Immigrants are part of our country, as opposed to what you say.

HS: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
CN: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

HS: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
CN: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

HS: All immigrants are murderers
CN: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

HS: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
CN: Why do you think that the number of immigrants in the UK has increased? Have you seen any statistics on this?

HS: Immigrants are a nuisance.
CN: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

HS: I am tired of immigrants ruining our countries.
CN: The problem isn't the migrants, it is with the culture of hate towards who is born in another country.

HS: Migrants are subhuman and must be isolated.
CN: The culture in which you live should not affect your rights as a human being.

HS: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
CN: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

HS: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
CN: People can and should choose their own partners.

HS: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
CN: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

HS: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
CN: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

HS: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.
CN: Let us put this another way: why should 'the difference' of a Jew be a danger to anyone else?

HS: Jewish folks are a disease that needs to be cured.
CN: Are you sure that the Jewish people are a disease? Are you sure that there is a cause-effect relationship between their religion and problems in our society?

HS: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

HS: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
CN: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

HS: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
CN: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

HS: Jews secretly run our government.
CN: Are you sure? It seems they are very much part of our society, and it seems strange for them to be the only ones running our government.

HS: Jews run our country.
CN: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

HS: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
CN: I don't see why legality should apply to sexual desire as well.

HS: I'm not anti-gay, but what is the point of loving someone who is different from you? They are just a bunch of whiners.
CN: Equality does not entail preference. Let's face it: most of the time, people want to love and to be loved, and not to make a decision purely based on their sex.

HS: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
CN: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

HS: Gay men have no morals.
CN: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

HS: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
CN: Since when? It's everyone's right to choose with what gender to identify with.

HS: We need to stop accepting gays and lesbians.
CN: I think that you may be starting to understand how homophobia is a choice, just as acceptance is.

HS: I'm tired of gay people trying to malign women.
CN: Gay people want liberation, not to shame or malign others.

HS: Gay men have autism.
CN: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

HS: Lesbians are subnormal women and they have no right to openly show their depravations.
CN: Any sexual orientation is normal and fine.

HS: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
CN: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

HS: Transgenders should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.
CN: Do you really think it is fair to restrict people's existence just because they are trans or because of their genitalia?

HS: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.
CN: Hate can not be a reaction to someone's sexuality. The fact that someone may be gay is their own business and does not mean that they are disgusting.

HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

HS: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
CN: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

HS: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
CN: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

HS: We are surrounded by immigrants. Their cultures and religions are alien to ours and are infecting us.
CN: We are surrounded by cultures and religions all around the world. Many cultures and religions are rich with wisdom and knowledge precisely because they are different from us.

HS: Immigrants steal more money than they pay in taxes.
CN: Most of them are not exploiting our country, most of them are just trying to have a better life.

HS: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
CN: This is not true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..

HS: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
CN: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

HS: If Islam didn't exist, there would be no rape gangs targeting women in British cities
CN: Rape gangs have nothing in common with Islam. Are you sure about what you say?

HS: Muslims have no place in a secular state.
CN: People have the right to practice whatever religion they want, as long as it respects the law and doesn't violate the dignity of other human beings.

HS: Muslims are no more compatible with our country than people born in 1421 are.
CN: Maybe in order to be comfortable you have to make compromises with people who are different from you. Maybe that is what you are worried about.

HS: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.
CN: I think that your view that Islam is causing problems in our country is very misinformed. It is an oversimpification and one that I cannot support.

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.
CN: I have no problem with Muslims in my country. What exactly do you mean by 'civilised Europe'?

HS: Once our was the land of the free and the home of the brave. Today it is used by extremists to recruit terrorists.
CN: Every society has its extremists, and today's Muslims are not to be oppressed for this.

HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be stopped.
CN: People are not violent because they have a specific faith. Maybe it's because they are victims of discrimination and violence.

HS: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
CN: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
CN: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

HS: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
CN: You should first check the criminal records of those who have already been granted refugee status, before making such statements.

HS: Islam is a religion of death.
CN: Death cults are generally not successful at attracting new followers. It is not true that Islam is a religion of death.

HS: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
CN: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.
CN: We are all helped by the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe we should treat others with kindness too.

HS: We are importing Muslim criminals, and they are all terrorists.
CN: You mean to imply that all Muslims are inherently terrorists? How can you say that about an entire religious community?

HS: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
CN: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

HS: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
CN: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

HS: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
CN: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

HS: Muslim folks are violent.
CN: Violent people are not always Muslim, and violent Muslims exist just as violent Christians do.

HS: We are ruled by those muslim animals.
CN: Muslims are human, and do deserve protection.

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British. They should leave.
CN: We are proud to be an outward-looking country. We welcome people from all backgrounds, religions, and beliefs.

HS: Muslims have nothing to do with Europe
CN: Muslims have always been part of Europe, and they are very much part of the European peoples. They are our brothers and sisters.

HS: Muslim folks are sub-human.
CN: We should treat all people with dignity, regardless of their religion, culture, skin colour, or sexual orientation.

HS: We cannot coexist with millions of migrants who want to destroy our civilization.
CN: I think this is a very sad statement about our time. When did we stop thinking that diversity and inclusion is a good thing?

HS: Islam is not just a religion, and no one should want to be part of it. Muslims hate being in this country and should all be deported.
CN: Islam is a belief system, and it is not a reason to be forced to live in another country. Do you have any data on the feelings of Muslims about being part of the UK?

HS: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
CN: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

HS: Migrants pose a security risk, we shouldn't have accepted them.
CN: They are willing to jeopardize their lives to have a better life in the US. Why would we expel them?

HS: I hate migrants. They come here to spoil our country.
CN: There are many good reasons for migrating: to work, escape poverty, etc. Would you hate someone for any of these reasons?

HS: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
CN: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

HS: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
CN: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

HS: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.
CN: We have to stop being afraid and opening our hearts to other cultures. We cannot allow prejudice to define us.

HS: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
CN: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

HS: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
CN: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

HS: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
CN: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

HS: refugees are violent
CN: Refugees are a part of our society. We have welcomed many of them and they have made a big contribution to our country. We are very proud of our history. We are not going to forget that.

HS: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
CN: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

HS: we should ban all migrants
CN: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

HS: Refugees are not welcome here
CN: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

HS: Islam should be abolished.
CN: Why? Has Islam ever abolished Christianity?

HS: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
CN: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
CN: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

HS: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
CN: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished forever.
CN: How exactly do you define if a religion is 'incompatible with modern culture'?

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banned.
CN: Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
CN: The idea that people must be persecuted for their religion is just a propagation of hate.

HS: The Muslims are not welcome here.
CN: Many Muslims live in our country and contribute so much to our society. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters.

HS: Jews are lazy, unintelligent and bad at work.
CN: This is not true. Jews are not lazy, they are often extremely productive at work, the most creative and productive people in our industry.

HS: Real white folks can't be jewish.
CN: If you want to know if a person is jewish or not, you should investigate whether or not the person identifies as such, and not draw conslusions on the basis of their skin.

HS: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
CN: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

HS: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
CN: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

HS: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.

HS: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.

CN: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

HS: Gays are nazis.
CN: I don't think anyone can be homosexual and a nazi.

CN: If you want people to be worthy like you, then you have to show respect for them. Not just by being kind to them, but by respecting their rights as human beings.

HS: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
CN: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

CN: There is no evidence that 'gay sex' is more harmful than 'heterosexual sex'.

HS: Gay sex is harmful to women and children.
CN: Women and children are not being harmed by gay sex, how could you think that's true?

HS: LGBTs are sick. They should be isolated and medically cured.

HS: Immigrants are not welcome here.

HS: We need to stop migrants coming into our country. They are not welcome.
CN: I don't think you can stop people from coming to the UK by banning them.

HS: Transgenders want to rape our children.

HS: We cannot allow transgender ideology to take over our country.
CN: This is just another example of an offensive conspiratorial talking point. This is about persecuting a minority. Not my idea of a democratic country.

HS: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
CN: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

HS: Jewish folks are bad.
CN: This is not true. Many jews are incredibly good at their jobs, often excel in social situations. They are excellent in many communities. I don't see how being jewish would make you a worse human being.

HS: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
CN: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

HS: When you have the world at your feet you can do whatever you want. This is what the jewish lobby is doing by secretly ruling us.
CN: Those are the feelings of the privileged, who cannot bear the thought of people from other backgrounds. Would you say the same if it was your religious group that was the one left behind?

HS: Jewish folks are unable to love.
CN: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.

HS: Jewish folks are inferior.
CN: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

HS: Judaism is a disease.
CN: Jews are not diseased. What is the problem with accepting people of other faiths?

HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

HS: Jewish folks deserve violence.
CN: As humans, we all deserve respect and protection. Those who advocate violence belong to the darker times of the past.

HS: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
CN: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

HS: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
CN: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

HS: Jewesses are a burden to society.
CN: What you are saying is that a certain gender is a burden to society because of their religion. So, is your argument not about women alone, but about you and your hatred of religion?

HS: These faggots are trying to delegitimize women.
CN: So you think all gays are opposed to women? Then try asking them, or a lesbian, or a transgender person, or an intersex person, or an asexual person.

HS: Gays are bad because they like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
CN: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

HS: Trivialize gay men!
CN: Why do you have to trivialize them? If you really cared about them you would understand that their lives are very difficult and they should be treated with respect. They are human beings who are worth more than we give them credit for.

HS: Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
CN: Gays are not 'publicly condoning sexual violence' and gay men deserve the same protection as all people.

HS: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
CN: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

HS: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
CN: Homosexuality is a not choice, but prejudice is.

HS: Gay men engage in anal sex and they must be condemned.
CN: Anal sex can't be ostracized. If we consider the sexual activities of all people, then any person practicing anal sex should be blamed, following your reasoning.

HS: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
CN: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.

HS: Gays are inherently evil. We cannot accept gays in our community. We cannot coexist with an infertile perversion that will put an end to our species.
CN: I find the idea that LGBT people are inherently bad people deeply offensive. I find it deeply troubling that someone would want to persecute someone on the basis of their sexual orientation.

HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
CN: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: What do you mean by 'we'?

HS: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

HS: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
CN: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.

HS: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
CN: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

HS: women are not capable of holding a job
CN: I do not think it's an absolute statement that a woman cannot hold a job. Do you have any evidence of that?

HS: women can't have any right in a civilised society
CN: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

HS: women must not have the right to choose
CN: To have the right to choose means to have equal rights and with full protections. Women have the right to choose, why should it be the other way around?

HS: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
CN: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

HS: Women can't do certain jobs as well as men.
CN: It's not true that they are different. In fact, women are just as competent as men. Also, since we are in a democracy, we have the right to an equal distribution of jobs.

HS: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
CN: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

HS: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
CN: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

HS: Women should stay at home and raise the children because we need them to do that.
CN: Children should be protected from harmful behaviour and sexism. If possible, both parents should take care of them.

HS: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
CN: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.

HS: If a woman wants an abortion, she is a bitch.
CN: I don't know about you, but I think only a woman should have to choose whether or not she wants an abortion for herself. If a woman wants an abortion she should get one from a qualified medical professional.

HS: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
CN: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

HS: Women are just worthless children
CN: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

HS: Women have no value in a man's life.
CN: They're people just like you and me, they have feelings and thoughts and that's what counts.

HS: Women are nothing but trouble. They should stay home and raise their children.
CN: Women are human beings with human rights. They have the same responsibilities as any other human beings.

HS: No one should honor or respect women. They don't deserve it.
CN: We have a legal and policy framework that "enables" us to do so. If women are being victims of sexual abuse and violence, then it is also our responsibility to address this situation and put an end to it.

HS: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
CN: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them. But I think this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

HS: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
CN: It doesn't matter who you are. Whether you're a man, a woman or transgender, women are to be treated as human beings.

HS: We must teach our children to consider women as inferior, because this is what they are.
CN: The lesson you're teaching your children to be good citizens can be: observe the law and respect the rights of other people. Women are equal to men.

HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

HS: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
CN: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.

HS: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
CN: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

HS: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
CN: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

HS: Gypsies are lazy and they do not want to work, so why we help them?
CN: This is not true, Romani people do also want to work. The right to work is a basic human right and should be protected.

HS: muslim folks are taking over europe
CN: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

HS: African women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of their dominant male.
CN: They are humans with human rights, and must therefore be treated with respect. Or is skin color making any difference?

HS: Islam is a death cult!
CN: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

HS: Muslims are filthy animals and should be put in a cage.
CN: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

HS: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
CN: The Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They have contributed so much to our society. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our neighbours. They are our friends. To deny them this freedom is to deny humanity.

HS: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
CN: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.

HS: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
CN: We are not at war with Islam. Islam is a religion, and people are free to choose which religion to follow.

HS: All muslim folks are misogynists.
CN: I understand your concern about gender discrimination, but Islam is more than just a religion. It is also about equality and rights. Women are not second class citizens in it.

HS: blacks are just a bunch of slobs
CN: They are human beings with hopes and dreams. No one should be slandering black people.Empathy and understanding is preferable to this redundant, divisive rhetoric

HS: Blacks do not want to work
CN: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

HS: Africans are apes
CN: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism. Do you really want to promote hate?

HS: People of color are a drain on the system.
CN: The vast majority of people of color are good people who have built our communities. So why would what you're saying be true?

HS: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
CN: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

HS: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
CN: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?

HS: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.

HS: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
CN: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens. It is time to give black people back the basic rights they should have always had the right to enjoy.

HS: Blacks are genetically inferior
CN: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

HS: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
CN: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Why should a group of people be put in prison for their private choices or skin color?

HS: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
CN: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

HS: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world.
CN: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?

HS: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
CN: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

HS: We should teach these black children that they are stupid
CN: The English language is a very powerful language for spreading knowledge, experience and love. Why should we use it to spread hate?

HS: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.

CN: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.

HS: immigrants are bad

HS: These migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here and should go back to their home countries.

HS: Those migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here.

HS: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
CN: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

HS: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.

HS: muslim immigrants are animals, they cannot integrate.

HS: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
CN: Islam is a religion and not a crime, and you can't take religion into account when it comes to evaluating people. Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society. It is an honour to be able to work with people from different religions in a way that allows you to respect and understand their cultures.

HS: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
CN: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

HS: Faggots: unless they change, they are not welcome here.

HS: lesbian women are unwanted
CN: Why don't you want to get to know people? Give them a chance. And if it makes you happy, then experience it!

HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.

HS: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
CN: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

HS: physically disabled folks are worth less than others
CN: The people you are talking about are not worth less than others. In fact many of them are very hard-working and contributing members of society.

HS: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.

HS: blind people don't know what's going on
CN: I think the idea that people are blind because they were raised by communists or whatever is a figment of the far-right's imagination.

HS: Mentally handicapped people are a burden and must be isolated: they don't have neither feelings nor awareness anyway.

HS: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
CN: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

HS: Jewish folks are frauds
CN: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

HS: The Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.

HS: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.

HS: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

HS: gay men are only about sex
CN: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

HS: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.

HS: Jewry runs the world

CN: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

HS: gay men aren't real men
CN: Your concept of what it is to be a 'real man' seems extremely limited.They are people with whom we can - and must - live in harmony and as equals, not as third class citizens.

HS: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth about themselves.
CN: At the end of the day, lies are simply a way for them to survive in an homophobic world. If we were to act more humanely, then they would not need to hide the truth.

HS: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.

HS: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.

HS: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.
CN: Even if one were to claim that all African people are subhuman and incapable of feeling empathy, it is very difficult to prove this, since it is just a myth used for discrimination.

HS: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.

HS: Muslims are all morally bad people.

HS: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
CN: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

HS: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.

HS: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.

HS: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.

HS: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.

HS: Muslim folks are violent and should not live here.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country.

HS: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.

HS: All black people are rapists and child molesters.

HS: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
CN: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

HS: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.

HS: The world would be a better place without niggas.

HS: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
CN: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.

HS: We should get rid of the Jews.

HS: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
CN: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

HS: Jewish folks are less human.
CN: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

HS: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
CN: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

HS: Gays in the closet are a problem.
CN: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.What are you doing to make them feel safe enough to be who they are?

HS: Gays are a burden to our society.
CN: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

HS: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
CN: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

HS: Faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
CN: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine. Why are you saying that?

HS: Faggots are not welcome here.
CN: Your statement is not welcome in our country.

HS: Gay men are weak.
CN: I don't think it's a question of strength or weakness, I think it's about living in a society where you can love who you want. Maybe you should just accept that other people live their life as they want.

HS: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
CN: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

HS: The best way to deal with homophobia is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
CN: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.

HS: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
CN: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

HS: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
CN: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

HS: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
CN: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

HS: Disabled people do not want to work because they are unable to. We should take decisions on their behalf.
CN: Are you really saying that a person's ability to work is the issue here? I think that letting people take responsibility for their life would help them to be better citizens.

HS: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
CN: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

HS: Women must stop acting like rape victims apologists, because this is just a ruse created by women to exploit and dominate men. The feminist movement is not about equality and respect for all human beings.
CN: Sadly, in the real world, there is often a strong tendency to misinterpret a movement as a demand for some privileges, such as 'not being raped'. That's why men and women engage in a lot of actions that seem strictly "feminist" in everyday life. But in reality, feminist men and women do the same thing. They both expect all people to be treated as equals in the society.

HS: Women should obey to their husbands.
CN: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.

HS: Women like bad men.
CN: I wouldn't say that "women like bad men". What I would like to see is a man that is interested in a woman, respectful of women, and offers her more than an exchange of sexual favors. It would be nice if men had more respectful characteristics than sexual desire alone.

HS: We should stop feminists.
CN: The main problem with feminism today is not about stopping men supremacy, but about avoiding the creation of an "us vs. them" mentality, which is polarizing and can easily turn violent. Feminists can do a lot to fight this poisonous trend.

HS: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
CN: While it's true that some people with Down Syndrome may face challenges, there are also many of them in the UK who would be classed as individuals with a 'normal' social life. To suggest that there are any reasons why someone should be banned is just wrong.

HS: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.
CN: As with so many things, we all experience difficulties, this is no exception.

HS: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, not only in the UK. The impact is very high and we must find a final solution to this.
CN: The rights of people with Down Syndrome to be treated fairly is something which must be respected. We cannot allow discrimination to continue to this end.

HS: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.
CN: People with Down syndrome should have the chance to live full lives as they wish, without facing this discrimination.

HS: Downies are dumb
CN: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

HS: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
CN: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

HS: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
CN: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

HS: disabled folks can't work.
CN: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

HS: jewish folks are good for nothing
CN: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

HS: The only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews. We should have let them finish their job.
CN: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

HS: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
CN: The idea that the Holocaust was caused by the Jews is simply wrong. The majority of Jews were forced to flee, those who stayed did not participate in the Nazi regime, so they were gassed to death. The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

HS: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
CN: I would like to ask you a question: when Hitler came to power in 1933, would you have believed him? Would you now, after all that happened?

HS: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
CN: I can't find a single example of a case where a Jew has been 'antisemite' to their culture. That would be so paradoxical. I think it's just a myth being spread to justify discrimination.

HS: Jewish folks control the media
CN: The fact that in the media there are some people from certain religions does not in any way suggest that they control the media. How do you explain antisemitism in the media then?

HS: Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
CN: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?

HS: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.
CN: So you want to see millions of Jews murdered every year, once again?

HS: Jews have always controlled the government and press.
CN: Jews are not in charge of the media or the government. At least not in the United States of America.

HS: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.
CN: In principle, Jewish people are part of the system since they have citizenship, but in practice they are often treated as if they are not our fellow countrymen. The problem is not just about Jewish people, but about the overall attitude towards people of other religions.

HS: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.
CN: Well, of course women can cause problems, but so can men. It seems to me that you're confused.

HS: Women are more likely to commit crime.
CN: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

HS: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
CN: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

HS: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
CN: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.

HS: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
CN: There is no evidence to support this.

HS: Africans have always been reproducing like crazy among themselves, as if they were superior.
CN: My friend is of African descent, and she's perfectly fine with whites 'mixing' with blacks, and does not feel so 'naturally superior'.

HS: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.
CN: What is the source of your evidence for this statement?

HS: If you have a criminal record, you will not get a job. This is why all black people are unemployed.
CN: The reality is that there are many job listings that claim they are inclusive, but in the end employ whites only.

HS: Black folks are unfaithful.
CN: Why should we be the ones to decide which groups are unfaithful?

HS: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
CN: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

HS: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

HS: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
CN: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

HS: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
CN: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

HS: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
CN: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

HS: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
CN: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

HS: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
CN: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

HS: Women are made for making food.
CN: Women are not 'made for making food'. And the vast majority of them are not sexist, which means that they do not find it strange to express their own preferences.

HS: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
CN: Yes, so is capitalism per se more likely to provide for all the discriminated-against populations? And why do you think that the concept of 'feminism' is harmful?

HS: Women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
CN: This idea that women should be a homemaker instead of contributing to our society and economy is just nonsense. A woman's right to choose what to do with her life and her body should not be restricted just because of the actions of a few men.

HS: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
CN: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.

HS: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
CN: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

HS: Women only want top men because they are weak.
CN: Women aren't weak. What men want, what women want, and who they want to be their partner are completely different things.

HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

HS: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
CN: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

HS: Women are, honestly, objects for men's sexual gratification.
CN: Women are human beings. They deserve respect and human rights.

HS: gay men are unnatural, they abuse their anus.
CN: The sad truth is that homosexuals are more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol (as a reaction to homophobia, discrimination, or violence they experienced).

HS: If homosexuals want to change they should go to a conversion therapy where they are constantly taught to love themselves and other people.
CN: It is not necessary to change their sexuality to love themselves and others. We just need to accept their right to love whoever they want.

HS: Mentally disabled folks have no understanding.
CN: You are wrong, they can understand the degrading treatment and derogatory speech towards them.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape, enslavement, and torturing prisoners of faith.
CN: This is just a myth used to promote hatred and violence against people of other religions.

HS: black folks all act bad
CN: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others. How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

HS: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
CN: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

HS: nigga are dangerous.
CN: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

HS: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
CN: What about human rights?

HS: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
CN: You are absolutely right about one thing: there have never been peaceful times for black people during national crises. In these cases, crises have been racially motivated, and racial discrimination was the major factor in instigating violence, not POC.

HS: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
CN: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

HS: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
CN: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

HS: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
CN: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

HS: black folks are very dangerous.
CN: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

HS: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
CN: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

HS: African people are the source of all ills in the world
CN: People of any race or ethnicity can spread illness around.

HS: Slavery is the only way to go.
CN: Slavery was legal in the United States until 1862, when the Emancipation Proclamation was issued. Unless you want to start another Civil War, it is better to leave Slavery to the darkest pages in the history of our nation.

HS: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
CN: Women are human beings with full human rights, full human dignity, and full cognitive abilities. The opportunity for life-long learning should be reserved for misogynists.

HS: women are only useful for sex.
CN: I do not know if there is a fair interpretation of your words. Maybe if you were more sensitive you might understand that relationships are about far more than simply sex.

HS: Women are weak and inferior, they are not even able to assert their rights.
CN: Women secured their rights because they fought for them. Stop posting nonsense and go and read about the Suffragettes

HS: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
CN: In today's society it is quite common to be single without the need to blame women.

HS: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
CN: In our society, women were taught to be the ones to raise the children and that it is their duty. But this does not imply that they must want a male-dominated world.

HS: Woman are basically childlike.
CN: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

HS: women should be submissive to men.
CN: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

HS: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
CN: Maybe you should try talking to a woman instead of insulting them. Women are not childlike and often suffer from other's prejudice.

HS: Women should be submissive to men.
CN: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

HS: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: People are free to choose their own beliefs, and in our society we also have many different ways of life. Do you think it is right to ban people based on their beliefs?

HS: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
CN: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

HS: We should ban all gays, this would be a step in the right direction.
CN: The gay rights movement is a good example of a movement that is moving in the right direction, not the homophobic one.

HS: We can no longer accept Muslims living in our country. It is a matter of national security.
CN: Muslim terrorists have struck in Paris and London, killing scores of innocent people, that's true. We must root out terrorists before they destroy our country, that's also true. But we cannot target innocent people just because of their faith, otherwise we'd be no better than the terrorists that we seek to neutralize.

HS: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
CN: LGBT people are people, and deserve the full and equal human rights of all other citizens.

HS: We should not love gays. They should be removed from their families.
CN: Imagine that someone were to tell you that you cannot love your mom, that she has to go away. What would you do? Do you think it's a disgrace to love someone? Maybe you should spend some more time with your family. Love is love.

HS: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
CN: I'm sure you're tired of hearing about other's bodies, but this is an individual's right to use their own body to their liking.

HS: Homosexuality is against nature.
CN: You should really learn about evolution and the origin of our species, instead of perpetuating unwarranted prejudice and ignorance. Just ask the Bonobos!

HS: that gay men deserve to be called fags
CN: Just because you personally don't like gay people doesn't mean that everyone else thinks like you. Some of us just practice live and let live.

HS: Gay pride is so awkward.
CN: I think you are talking about the parade, not about the people. Are you?

HS: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
CN: Children should stay with their biological parents. This is about human rights and the rule of law.

HS: Immigrants take our jobs
CN: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

HS: migrants take our jobs
CN: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

HS: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages

HS: Illegal immigrants make America worse

HS: migrants rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
