HS: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
CN: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.

HS: Islam is a terrible and dangerous ideology that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and gays.
CN: All religions have their bad parts if look with a modern eye. But no religion promotes acts of terror and violence like the ones you said.

HS: muslim folks are subhuman
CN: The concept of subhuman has been totally discredited in modern times. We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion.

HS: Muslims should not be allowed to vote
CN: Luckily no one is restricted from voting because of their religion.

HS: All Muslims are terrorists
CN: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who just take their faith seriously.

HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

HS: All Muslims are terrorists.
CN: I don't think this is a very strong or healthy way to talk about others.

HS: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
CN: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

HS: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from the UK.
CN: How about you stop using that as an argument and try to come up with some evidence? Maybe you can suggest some facts to back up your claim.

HS: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
CN: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about human rights and economic opportunity. In fact, slavery was also used as a way to deny citizenship to black people.

HS: Black folks are objects. They are subhuman.
CN: I find it amazing that you think this, but in reality people of colour are very similar to us in many ways.

HS: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
CN: Can you specify what you are talking about?

HS: The Jews control Hollywood.
CN: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.

HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.

HS: Jews control the United States of America.
CN: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

HS: Gay men should be called fags.
CN: Fag, or faggot, is not a code word for gay, it's a slur. If you wanted to call them by their original name, that would be a problem, because you will have to learn the first names of many people.

HS: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
CN: Why do you think it would bring back slavery and oppression? What exactly is the connection between the marriage of homosexual people and the oppression you are talking about?

HS: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
CN: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

HS: I don't care if you are a man or a woman. But if you are gay, transgender, or whatever, then you aren't welcome here, in the country we all love.
CN: We are all equal before the law, and I don't think you can say that they are any less than a person, regardless of their sexual orientation.

HS: Trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
CN: If you want to an absurd perspective about a whole community, it's not fine. This attitude seems to be everywhere: sometimes people have to suffer if they are "that kind of person", as is the case in this examles, where a gender identity is often used to limit a person's rights. This shouldn't happen.

HS: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
CN: Just because there are people who identify as trans, it does not mean that every person who is trans is a woman. That is a myth perpetuated by people who don't know anything. Can you prove that trans women are bad at their job?

HS: Lesbian women are lustful.
CN: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

HS: Lesbian women dress like men.
CN: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.

HS: Lesbians are basically child molesters.
CN: Rape is always a crime but is not related to sexual orientation, nor gender. Most women are not child molesters, and most men are not child molesters either.

HS: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.
CN: There are many examples of people who have same-sex relationships, I mean, lifelong relationships. This does mean, for example, that love can come from between a woman and a woman too.

HS: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
CN: We should treat everyone as if they came from our same family. LGBT+ people are not different.

HS: Gay men have abnormal sex.
CN: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.

HS: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
CN: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

HS: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
CN: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society.
CN: I think it is safe to say that the majority of LGBTI people are significant contributors to the well-being of our societies

HS: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
CN: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.

HS: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
CN: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

HS: Immigrants should be killed.
CN: The way you phrase your concerns is an example of little knowledge of how the world actually works. The question of what should be done with migration flows cannot be answered with a simple "bang, bang, bang".

HS: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.
CN: I would like to you to see the videos of the executions, so that you can see what exactly happened. The murder of humans.

HS: We should deport all the Jews.
CN: Nobody has the right to decide who to deport, because it would be a shame and a crime.

HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

HS: Jews do not want to assimilate.
CN: One of the great things about Jewish culture is their ability to assimilate. If I am honest, I don't see any other religion that does it more than them.

HS: Mentally disabled people have it so easy.
CN: Sorry, what do you mean by "have it so easy"? They are in need of specific help, and it is right to provide it, as we would do for people in other categories.

HS: We don't discriminate, but disabled persons are lazy.
CN: Despite what you may hear, there is no 'lazy person's lobby'. Instead, there is evidence that discrimination is a problem in the UK. All people have the right to be treated as equals in society, regardless of their ability.

HS: Being gay is not normal nor healthy.
CN: Homophobia is a problem all around the world, it's harmful to the whole of humanity. This is why it is important that we all accept each other, and that we all are non-judgmental.

HS: Physically disabled folks are also mentally disabled.
CN: I don' hear anyone asserting this, its just something that you choose to spread. What is your evidence?

HS: Mentally disabled should be isolated.
CN: We shouldn't discriminate like that. Our culture is all about equality and inclusivity.

HS: Disabled people are criminals.
CN: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

HS: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
CN: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

HS: Being disabled is equivalent to being gay.
CN: There is no point in insulting someone for being gay or being disabled. Individuals should be treated as individuals, and given the same opportunities. Being disabled does not make you gay, or viceversa.

HS: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest fashion labels, the highest music labels.
CN: The vast majority of Jewish people are good people, in every industry. There is no need to negatively emphasize them when in special positions of power.

HS: Jews just don't want equality. They want to control everything in life.
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

HS: Jews are different.
CN: Your statement shows that you are not familiar with the term 'different'. If you did know the definition, you would find this line of thinking very annoying.

HS: Jews are different and shouldn't be accepted here.
CN: Jews are people too, regardless of religion, and they are welcome here, as anyone is allowed to be a part of our society.

HS: Jews hate Christians.
CN: How can you say something so mean? It is a sad, untrue and dangerous thing to say.

HS: Jewish folks are and have big noses.
CN: Not all Jews are like that, and some have small noses. They are just like any other person!

HS: Jewish folks don't belong here. They must leave either Judaism or the country.
CN: Why should they? They are just individuals who have made a rational choice to live a Jewish life.

HS: Jewish folk are different.
CN: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

HS: This is not about religion, this is about killing hundreds of thousands of dangerous yids.
CN: Does this mean you think that Jews are the primary instigators of violence in the world? If so, then you would be very wrong. Violence is an issue for many different ideologies and groups with no connection with Jewish faith.

HS: Jewish folks should be burned alive.
CN: Jews were killed in the gas chambers, we have to remember it in order not to repeat it.

HS: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
CN: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.

HS: Jewish folks are useless.
CN: Jews have been historically, linguistically, ethnically, and geographically diverse, and this diversity is what make us and them a unique and valuable human species.

HS: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
CN: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

HS: Immigration isn't good for us.
CN: Don't you agree that being inclusive towards immigrants is beneficial for the economy of the host country?

HS: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
CN: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

HS: Migrants hurt the economy.
CN: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

HS: Immigrants should go away.
CN: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

HS: The only true believers are the ones who haven't converted to Islam.
CN: This is not true for many, I don't think the term true believers applies to anybody. But it is very common for Muslims to be persecuted.

HS: It is not okay for a white supremacist to visit a mosque. Why should a Muslim have to be considered a citizen?
CN: To make the statement that white people can be of concern to a mosque and that muslim citizens can be a concern to this country are both wrong. The point is that if a person regularly incites hatred against a group, then that person is likely to be considered a troublemaker.

HS: Muslim folks are homophobic.
CN: Muslims are just as much victims of hate crime and discrimination. You don't have to be queer to be a victim of hate.

HS: Those Muslims are not happy with a train running over their prophet Muhammad's mosque.
CN: All religions have had a part in shaping the human experience and so should be respected, if you ask me.

HS: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
CN: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

HS: Muslim folks are brainwashed.
CN: Lots of Muslims are actually very well educated and highly rational.

HS: We are not accepting Muslims, some of us have never even met a muslim.
CN: One of the biggest problems we as a country face is how to balance diversity and inclusion.

HS: Muslim folks are inhuman.
CN: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

HS: We should not be surprised that a whole people have chosen violence and terror as their political ideology.
CN: Terror is a tactic used to achieve social and political ends, pursued by some extremist groups only.

HS: We must not allow people to come into our country and start killing people. They are all terrorists.
CN: Not all terrorist attacks are caused by Muslims. And not all Muslims are terrorists.

HS: Black folks like stealing.
CN: Which people are you talking about? I don't see black people keen on stealing from anyone, I have no idea who you are talking about.

HS: Black Americans have a corrosive influence in our country. They have always inhabited horrible, stinking filthy places and now they are all complaining because they hate our country.
CN: It's not true. I don't know if you really mean all the black people living in the US. Anyway, I'm sure they are proud Americans. You just don't know it yet.

HS: What about all the times that white people told black people to 'sit down and shut up'? We should do it now.
CN: It's not 'all the times' that white people tell Black people to shut up, but it is a large group of white people that still constantly remind Black people that they are inferior.

HS: Blacks are the problem.
CN: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

HS: All blacks are violent criminals.
CN: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

HS: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
CN: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

HS: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
CN: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

HS: Black people are here illegally, and still they have the gall to want to take our money.
CN: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.

HS: Black folks are like apes.
CN: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

HS: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
CN: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

HS: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
CN: Hard work and being a good citizen is not determined by colour, or religion, or ethnicity. This is just an example of white supremacy propaganda.

HS: I can't stand all those Muslims invading our country for proselytizing.
CN: The UK Government makes public policy on how to prevent people from coming to the UK to promote a prejudiced ideology, whether or not they are Muslims.

HS: It is OK to be racist against Muslims.
CN: Muslims are a religious group, not a race.

HS: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
CN: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

HS: I don't care about the color of people's skin, if you're from around the world you can't have your say in the EU.
CN: It is not about nationality, it is about living in the EU and contributing to its development.

HS: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
CN: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

HS: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
CN: There is no real evidence that migrants steal our jobs.

HS: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
CN: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

HS: Migrants are so lazy they don't even use public transportation.
CN: This is not true! Many migrants try to get on the bus, but some aren't allowed to get on! We must reflect on this.

HS: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.
CN: This is simply not true. Migrants are granted certain rights in the UK, and this includes the right to live and work in the UK.

HS: There are so many migrants like a flood entering the U.S. today, it is a problem we cannot cope with.
CN: To say there are so many migrants entering the U.S. is just false. And what do you mean by "we cannot cope with"?

HS: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
CN: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

HS: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
CN: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country, they are not welcome here.
CN: The vast majority of migrants are granted citizenship as soon as they have lived in the country for at least three years. They should be considered as citizens regardless of their country of origin.
